column4: hello, I downloaded the ubuntu cd, burned it, restarted and it came up fine. however, after restarting it gets stuck
what do you mean by stuck?
what does that do? (I've been removed from linux for a few years and don't remember that at all)
any thing other than bios bug #81?
nope.... just goes to a blank (looks like the lcd is producing black) screen
what are the specs on this laptop
I just googled that also ... It appears people have been having trouble w/ the same 'series' (compaq f500)... amd 64 x2 tk-53, 1gb ram, nvidia stuff, broadcom wireless
are you trying to install via the live cd or just play with the live cd?
you could always try the alternate install if you cant get the live to go
should I be using the 64 bit version (I have an AMD 64 x2 TK-53)?
the alternate installer should not have a start in safe graphics mode
